"Hero Talis":
"When a Talis is equipped by a Hero, it performs \"Hero Talis\" attacks and PAs instead of normal Talis attacks.

Unlike a conventional Talis, Hero Talis can use Photon Arts, and can perform a variety of attacks combining Talis, PA and Technique.

Some Hero Talis PAs automatically switch to other Hero weapons if you hold the PA button."

"With Hero Talis equipped, you can mark a place to teleport to by charging and firing the Weapon Action.

When the marker is active, you can press the Weapon Action button again to teleport to it."
